statements: SELECT * FROM books WHERE author_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT title, genre FROM books WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, publication_date FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY author_name ASC, publication_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM books;
SELECT title, author_name, genre FROM books WHERE genre = 'Fiction' ORDER BY author_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT title, genre FROM books WHERE publication_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) as book_count FROM books GROUP BY author_name HAVING book_count > 1 ORDER BY book_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY publication_date DESC, author_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM books;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_name, author_id FROM authors WHERE author_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT book_title, genre FROM books WHERE genre = 'Fiction' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT book_title, author_name FROM books INNER JOIN authors ON books.author_id = authors.author_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_books FROM books;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT book_title, genre FROM books WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, book_title FROM authors JOIN books ON authors.author_id = books.author_id;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery' AND publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, COUNT(book_title) AS total_books FROM authors LEFT JOIN books ON authors.author_id = books.author_id GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY total_books DESC;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_name, author_id FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT title_name, genre FROM titles WHERE genre = 'Mystery';
SELECT publication_id, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date;
SELECT author_name, title_name FROM authors INNER JOIN publications ON authors.author_id = publications.author_id ORDER BY author_name ASC, title_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT title_name, genre FROM titles ORDER BY genre DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM authors WHERE author_id < 5;
SELECT title_name FROM titles WHERE genre = 'Sci-Fi' AND title_id < 10;
SELECT author_name, title_name FROM authors JOIN publications ON authors.author_id = publications.author_id WHERE publications.publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY title_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT title_name, publication_date FROM titles JOIN publication_dates ON titles.title_id = publication_dates.title_id;
SELECT author_name, genre_name FROM authors JOIN titles ON authors.author_id = titles.author_id JOIN genres ON titles.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM genres WHERE genre_name = 'Mystery';

SELECT author_name, title_name, publication_date FROM authors JOIN titles ON authors.author_id = titles.author_id JOIN publication_dates ON titles.title_id = publication_dates.title_id ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, title_name FROM authors INNER JOIN titles ON authors.author_id = titles.author_id;
SELECT title_name, genre_name FROM titles INNER JOIN genres ON titles.title_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, title_name, publication_date FROM authors INNER JOIN titles ON authors.author_id = titles.author_id INNER JOIN publication_dates ON titles.title_id = publication_dates.title_id;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(title_name) AS total_titles FROM authors INNER JOIN titles ON authors.author_id = titles.author_id GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_id, author_name FROM authors;
SELECT book_title, genre, publication_date FROM books;
SELECT author_name, book_title, genre FROM authors JOIN books ON authors.author_id = books.author_id;
SELECT book_title, genre_name FROM books JOIN genres ON books.genre = genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_id, author_name FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT book_title, publication_date FROM books WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT authors.author_name, books.book_title FROM authors JOIN authors_books ON authors.author_id = authors_books.author_id JOIN books ON authors_books.book_id = books.book_id;
SELECT books.book_title, genres.genre_name FROM books JOIN books_genres ON books.book_id = books_genres.book_id JOIN genres ON books_genres.genre_id = genres.genre_id ORDER BY genres.genre_name ASC;
